name: IOTA
intro: Distributed ledger built for the “Internet of Everything”
introduce: IOTA is an open, feeless and scalable distributed ledger built for the “Internet of Everything”, designed to support frictionless data and value transfer.IOTA aims to be transaction settlement and data transfer layer for the Internet of Things (IoT). It's distributed ledger, the Tangle, is based on a data structure referred to as a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG).
